remarks: Elementhood in the orthocomplement of a subset (normally a subspace) of a pre-Hilbert space.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 13-Oct-2015.)
statement:
ocvfval.v $e |- V = ( Base ` W ) $.

elocv $p |- ( A e. ( ._|_ ` S ) <-> ( S C_ V /\ A e. V /\ A. x e. S ( A ., x ) = .0. ) ) $.
